objects.description: [Mustang Panda](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0129) has used 'adobeupdate.dat' as a [PlugX](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0013) loader, and a file named 'OneDrive.exe' to load a [Cobalt Strike](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0154) payload.(Citation: Recorded Future REDDELTA July 2020)

external_references.description: Insikt Group. (2020, July 28). CHINESE STATE-SPONSORED GROUP ‘REDDELTA’ TARGETS THE VATICAN AND CATHOLIC ORGANIZATIONS. Retrieved April 13, 2021.
